name: 8 Ball Pool (itch) (Adam Hubble)
description:
A two-player two-dimensional top-down sports simulation game developed for desktop applications, which emulates classical 8 ball pool. The simulation utilises real-time physics to address gameplay mechanics. 

The basis of the game follows the conventions of classical 8 ball pool, which is turn-orientated and conditioned by a series of rules. Two players alternate their turn locally via one device. Each player's objective is to defeat one another, corresponding with the rules of the sport.
